original_text: But their children also turned against me. They were not careful to obey my laws and my commands. (But anyone who obeyed them would enjoy a good life.) They did not obey my rules about Sabbath days. So I was very angry with them. I was ready to destroy them there in the wilderness.
korean_text: 그러나 그들의 자손이 내게 반역하여 사람이 지켜 행하면 그로 말미암아 삶을 얻을 나의 율례를 따르지 아니하며 나의 규례를 지켜 행하지 아니하였고 나의 안식일을 더럽힌지라 이에 내가 이르기를 내가 광야에서 그들에게 내 분노를 쏟으며 그들에게 내 진노를 이루리라 하였으나

sentences.original_text: But their children also turned against me.
They were not careful to obey my laws
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 나의 법을 신중하게 순종하지 않았습니다.

sentences.original_text: They did not obey my rules about Sabbath days.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 안식일에 대한 나의 규칙을 순종하지 않았습니다.

sentences.original_text: So I was very angry with them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 나는 그들에게 매우 화가 났습니다.

sentences.original_text: I was ready to destroy them
